text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Sandhikharka | native_name = सन्धिखर्क | other_name = | settlement_type = City | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_caption = | image_flag = | image_seal = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = bottom | pushpin_mapsize = 300 | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Nepal |coordinates= | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Nepal | subdivision_type1 = Zone | subdivision_name1 = Lumbini Zone | subdivision_type2 = District | subdivision_name2 = Arghakhanchi District | subdivision_type3 = | established_title = | established_date = | government_type = | government_footnotes = | leader_title = | leader_name = | unit_pref = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_total_sq_mi = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 40422 | population_as_of = 2011 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_blank1_title = Ethnicities | population_blank2_title = Religions | population_blank2 = Hindu | population_note = | timezone = Nepal Time | utc_offset = +5:45 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = 32700 | area_code = 077 | website = | footnotes = }} Sandhikharka () is a municipality in Nepal. It is the headquarters of Arghakhanchi District, in the Lumbini Zone of Nepal. On 18 May 2014, it was converted into a municipality by merging Sandhikharka, Bangla, Narapani, Khanchikot, Kimadada, Argha and Dibharna VDCs. ==Related pages== *Development Regions of Nepal *Zones of Nepal ==References== Category:Cities in Nepal Category:Municipalities of Nepal
title: Sandhikharka
